/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the cultural context of the location. Trees and power lines add elements of nature and infrastructure to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the buildings and trees.
